scenes.background: Monica flips through some papers, visibly worried. Bob taps his foot impatiently.
scenes.description: ‘Alright, but we really need to get this done. Any last thoughts before we proceed?’

options.text: Let's assign tasks based on each team member's strengths.
options.analysis: You proposed a constructive approach, showcasing strong perception and empathy, though your self-regulation could be a bit stronger.

options.text: I think you and Bob can handle it. Just prioritize the most critical tasks.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution while maintaining your stance on leave, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy.

options.text: Monica, you're overthinking it. Bob can manage the task. It's his responsibility.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might negatively impact team dynamics.
